summary: This document is a collection of FedEx invoices and shipping summaries from 2000-2003 for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein and his company, J Epstein & Co Inc. It details shipping charges, addresses, and some recipient information, providing a record of financial transactions and correspondence logistics.

persons.name: Jeffrey E Epstein
persons.context: Appears as the named account holder and recipient/sender on multiple FedEx invoices for shipments to/from his New York and Palm Beach addresses.

persons.name: Mrs. Sherman
persons.context: Listed as part of the shipping/billing address for J Epstein & Co Inc on several invoices, suggesting a role in handling correspondence.

persons.name: Antoinette
persons.context: Appears as the name of a recipient for a FedEx 2Day shipment from J Epstein & Co Inc in July/August 2000.

connections.description: Mrs. Sherman is listed as part of the company address for J Epstein & Co Inc, suggesting an administrative or staff role.
Epstein's company shipped a package to Antoinette, indicating a recipient of correspondence or goods.

events.title: Shipment to Antoinette
events.description: A FedEx 2Day package from J Epstein & Co Inc was picked up for delivery to Antoinette. The delivery was attempted on Aug 2, 2000, but noted with an 'INCORRECT RECIPIENT ADDRESS' and was delivered on Aug 3, 2000.

events.title: Overnight Shipment from Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A FedEx Standard Overnight envelope was sent from Jeffrey Epstein, delivered on Aug 9, 2000.

events.title: Holiday Season Shipment
events.description: A FedEx 2Day package from J Epstein & Co Inc was picked up and delivered on Dec 18, 2000, during the Christmas holiday period.

events.title: Overnight Pak Shipment
events.description: A FedEx Standard Overnight 'Pak' was sent from Jeffrey E Epstein, delivered on Feb 13, 2001.

events.title: Weather-Delayed Shipment
events.description: A FedEx Standard Overnight envelope to Jeffrey E Epstein was picked up but delayed due to a thunderstorm, delivered on Oct 20, 2003.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein used FedEx account number 1144-2081-6 for shipping from at least 2000 to 2003.
Invoices show shipments billed to both 'Jeffrey E Epstein' personally and his company 'J Epstein & Co Inc' at the same 457 Madison Ave address.
A 'Mrs. Sherman' is consistently listed as part of the shipping/billing address for J Epstein & Co Inc, indicating a staff member handling mail.
One shipment in 2000 was addressed to a person named 'Antoinette' and was initially flagged for an incorrect recipient address.
The documents include a cryptic, numbered list labeled 'MASSEUSES' (likely 'Masseuses') from 1 to 254, appended after the financial invoices, the purpose of which is unclear from the provided text.
